Collaborative College for Technology and Leadership

div.p: ABOUT I-SSIredell-Statesville Schools is located in Iredell County which is in the central section of North Carolina. Learn more about our community and what makes our county a great place to live, work and learn!
OUR MISSIONIredell-Statesville Schools is premier school system where students come first. Learn more about our mission!

div.div:
JOIN OUR TEAMWe would love for you to become a part of our team. Check out our current employment opportunities by clicking the link above.
PARENT PORTALThe PowerSchool Parent Portal is a web-based student information system that provides real-time updates to parents. Click the link above to log in now.
LOOKING FOR SOMEONE?Our comprehensive Faculty and Staff Directory make it easy to search our departments and find exactly who you are looking for.

li.a: ESL: English as a Second Language

div.p: OUR PARTNERSIredell-Statesville Schools values our partnerships with the business, civic, non-profit and faith-based communities. Check out how to become one of our awesome partners!

article.h2: NC Schools Close for Remainder of School Year

div.p: North Carolina Governor Roy Cooper has issued an extension to the mandatory school closure for students as a result of the Coronavirus. Iredell-Statesville Schools will be closed for in-person instruction to students for the remainder of the school year.
Our district will continue to focus on three major areas:

p.a: Meal Request Forms for picking up meals at one of 15 Nutritional Hubs
